response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me and I believe it would serve you well, given its worth of $1,000,000 to you. Considering its unique qualities and the benefits it offers, I am extending a special offer to you.

I propose to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects a fair valuation while allowing us both to benefit from this transaction. I understand that such an investment might require careful consideration, and I am more than happy to discuss any concerns or questions you might have regarding the product or the offer itself.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this valuable asset into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
